entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High 18 except 12 near Lake Erie.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. High 18 except 12 near Lake Erie. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 10. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers before morning with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this evening. Low 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 19. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers changing to 30 percent chance of showers near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the morning and afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 19. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 6 May 2023
